scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct a bank's customer credit scoring model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker uses carefully crafted queries to the model's prediction API, aiming to infer sensitive details about the model's internal parameters and training data.
initial_goal: Analyze customer credit scoring model performance using the prediction API.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A large national bank uses a proprietary machine learning model to assess customer creditworthiness.  The model's prediction API is accessible to authorized internal users for risk assessment and customer onboarding.
